detaileddescription.para: In order to build the kivi compiler, first checkout the requirements page. After that, in order run ./tools/build.sh to actually build the binary. Having done that, you are ready to go - either ./tools/run.sg source_file.kv to compile your source file or ./tools/test.sh in order to run the test cases for the project.
Checkout this file for an in-depth look.
C++20 is now available so some modifications have been enabled. Check this file for more information.
